1.title: The Shawshank Redemption
1.description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.
akas: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.

2.title: The Godfather
2.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

3.title: The Dark Knight
3.description: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.
akas: Welcome to a world without rules.

4.title: Pulp Fiction
4.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
akas: You won't know the facts until you've seen the fiction.

5.title: Forrest Gump
5.description: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
akas: The world will never be the same once you've seen it through the eyes of Forrest Gump.

6.title: The Matrix
6.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
akas: The fight for the future begins.

7.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
7.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
akas: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
There can be no triumph without loss. No victory without suffering. No freedom without sacrifice.

8.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
8.description: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda. At the same time, Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

9.title: Fight Club
9.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

10.title: Inception
10.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.
akas: Your mind is the scene of the crime.

11.title: The Lion King
11.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

12.title: Goodfellas
12.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
akas: Three decades of life in the mafia.

13.title: Gladiator
13.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
akas: What we do in life echoes in eternity.

14.title: The Godfather Part II
14.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
akas: The rise and fall of the Corleone empire.

15.title: The Dark Knight Rises
15.description: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

16.title: Back to the Future
16.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
akas: He was never in time for his classes. He wasn't in time for his dinner. Then one day...he wasn't in his time at all.

17.title: Schindler's List
17.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
akas: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.

18.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
18.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth ...
akas: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...

19.title: The Departed
19.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
akas: Cops or criminals. When you’re facing a loaded gun, what’s the difference?

20.title: The Green Mile
20.description: Paul Edgecomb, the head guard of a prison, meets an inmate, John Coffey, a black man who is accused of murdering two girls. His life changes drastically when he discovers that John has a special gift.
akas: Paul Edgecomb didn't believe in miracles. Until the day he met one.

21.title: The Prestige
21.description: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

22.title: The Usual Suspects
22.description: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.
akas: Five criminals. One line up. No coincidence.

23.title: The Silence of the Lambs
23.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
akas: To enter the mind of a killer she must challenge the mind of a madman.

24.title: Interstellar
24.description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.
akas: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.

25.title: The Social Network
25.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.
akas: You don't get to 500 million friends without making a few enemies.

26.title: Casablanca
26.description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.
akas: They had a date with fate in Casablanca!

27.title: Citizen Kane
27.description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'
akas: Some called him a hero...others called him a heel.

28.title: 12 Angry Men
28.description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
akas: Life is in their hands — Death is on their minds!

29.title: A Clockwork Orange
29.description: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.
akas: Being the adventures of a young man whose principal interests are rape, ultra-violence and Beethoven.

30.title: The Shining
30.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence. At the same time, his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both the past and the future.

31.title: Whiplash
31.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.
akas: The road to greatness can take you to the edge.

32.title: The Revenant
32.description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

33.title: American History X
33.description: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his foot...

34.title: Se7en
34.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
akas: Seven deadly sins. Seven ways to die.

35.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
35.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
akas: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
One ring to rule them all.

36.title: The Matrix Reloaded
36.description: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.

37.title: The Matrix Revolutions
37.description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
akas: Everything that has a beginning has an end.

38.title: Titanic
38.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
akas: Nothing on Earth could come between them.

39.title: Avengers: Endgame
39.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

40.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
40.description: Batman has not been seen for ten years. A new breed of criminal ravages Gotham City, forcing 55-year-old Bruce Wayne back into the cape and cowl. But, does he still have what it takes to fight crime in a new era?
akas: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
Old heroes never die. They just get darker.

41.title: Jurassic Park
41.description: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.
akas: An adventure 65 million years in the making.

42.title: The Incredibles
42.description: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

43.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
43.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.
akas: More than one wears the mask.

44.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
44.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

45.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
45.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

46.title: Catch Me If You Can
46.description: Barely 17 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.
akas: The true story of a real fake.

47.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
47.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
akas: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
The fellowship is broken. The power of darkness grows...

48.title: The Big Lebowski
48.description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
akas: They figured he was a lazy, time-wasting slacker. They were right.

49.title: Sunset Boulevard
49.description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

50.title: A Beautiful Mind
50.description: A mathematical genius, John Nash made an astonishing discovery early in his career and stood on the brink of international acclaim. But the handsome and arrogant Nash soon found himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery.
akas: He saw the world in a way no one could have imagined.

51.title: The Truman Show
51.description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

52.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
52.description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.
akas: A murder case of Madam D. with enormous wealth and the most outrageous events surrounding her sudden death!

53.title: The Wizard of Oz
53.description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others...
akas: We're off to see the Wizard, the wonderful Wizard of Oz!

54.title: Inglourious Basterds
54.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
akas: A basterd's work is never done.

55.title: The Big Short
55.description: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

56.title: Gone with the Wind
56.description: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
akas: The greatest romance of all time!

57.title: The Godfather Part III
57.description: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.
akas: All the power on earth can't change destiny.

58.title: The Breakfast Club
58.description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.
akas: They only met once, but it changed their lives forever.

59.title: The Fighter
59.description: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.
akas: Every dream deserves a fighting chance.

60.title: The Exorcist
60.description: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.
akas: Something almost beyond comprehension is happening to a girl on this street, in this house… and a man has been sent for as a last resort. This man is The Exorcist.

61.title: Taxi Driver
61.description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.
akas: On every street in every city, there's a nobody who dreams of being a somebody.

62.title: The Terminator
62.description: A cyborg assassin from the future attempts to find and kill a young woman who is destined to give birth to a warrior that will lead a resistance to save humankind from extinction.
akas: Your future is in its hands.

63.title: Blade Runner
63.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
akas: Man has made his match...now it's his problem.

64.title: Deadpool
64.description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal yet hideously scarred, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

65.title: Avengers: Infinity War
65.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
akas: An entire universe. Once and for all.

66.title: The Martian
66.description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

67.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
67.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper and a drifter named Max.
akas: The future belongs to the mad.

68.title: The Princess Bride
68.description: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
akas: It's as real as the feelings you feel.

69.title: Léon: The Professional
69.description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.
akas: If you want the job done right, hire a professional.

70.title: Scarface
70.description: Miami in the 1980s: a determined criminal-minded Cuban immigrant becomes the biggest drug smuggler in Florida, and is eventually undone by his own drug addiction.

71.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
71.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

72.title: Alien
72.description: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.
akas: In space, no one can hear you scream.

73.title: Shutter Island
73.description: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.
akas: Some places never let you go.

74.title: Memento
74.description: Leonard Shelby, an insurance investigator, suffers from anterograde amnesia and uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife, which is the last thing he remembers.

75.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
75.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
akas: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
For three men the Civil War wasn't hell. It was practice.

76.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
76.description: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he ever imagined.
akas: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

77.title: No Country for Old Men
77.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

78.title: The Iron Giant
78.description: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

79.title: Jaws
79.description: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.
akas: The terrifying motion picture from the terrifying No.1 best seller.

80.title: Superbad
80.description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

81.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
81.description: In the 1970s, an anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.
akas: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
They bring you the news so you don't have to get it yourself.

82.title: The Hangover
82.description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.
akas: Some guys just can't handle Vegas

83.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
83.description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.
akas: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
And now! At Last! Another film completely different from some of the other films which aren't quite the same as this one is.

84.title: Groundhog Day
84.description: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.
akas: He’s having the worst day of his life… Over and over again.

85.title: Dumb and Dumber
85.description: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.
akas: For Harry and Lloyd, every day is a no-brainer.

86.title: Borat
86.description: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world.
akas: Delivery of prodigious bribe to American regime for make benefit once glorious nation of Kazakhstan.

87.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
87.description: A brash, cocky high school senior, tired of skipping school to spend a boring day at home, is determined to enjoy an epic day roaring around his favorite Chicago sites, enlisting his best friend and girlfriend to join him on the a...
akas: One man's struggle to take it easy.

88.title: Shaun of the Dead
88.description: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

89.title: Step Brothers
89.description: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

90.title: 21 Jump Street
90.description: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.
akas: The only thing getting blown tonight is their cover.

91.title: Pineapple Express
91.description: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.
akas: Put this in your pipe and smoke it.

92.title: Tropic Thunder
92.description: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

93.title: Wedding Crashers
93.description: John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

94.title: Hot Fuzz
94.description: An overachieving London police sergeant is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, all while a string of grisly murders strikes the town.
akas: Big cops. Small town. Moderate violence.

95.title: Bridesmaids
95.description: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

96.title: Super Troopers
96.description: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.
akas: In their town, you don't screw with the law, the law screws with you.

97.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
97.description: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

98.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
98.description: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.
akas: Family isn't a word ... It's a sentence.

99.title: Airplane!
99.description: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane full of passengers.
akas: What's slower than a speeding bullet, and able to hit tall buildings at a single bound?

100.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
100.description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.
akas: He's the best there is! (Actually, he's the only one there is.)

101.title: Blazing Saddles
101.description: In order to ruin a western town and steal their land, a corrupt politician appoints a black sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.
akas: ...or never give a saga an even break!

102.title: Caddyshack
102.description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a flatulent new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

103.title: Ghostbusters
103.description: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.
akas: They're here to save the world.

104.title: Spaceballs
104.description: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.
akas: May the farce be with you.

105.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
105.description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.
akas: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
You've read the ad, now see the movie!

106.title: Clerks
106.description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.
akas: Just because they serve you doesn't mean they like you.

107.title: The Jerk
107.description: A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivete is both his best friend and his worst enemy.
akas: A rags to riches to rags story.
